```{r}
create_demo_card <- function(title, description, repo_name, icon) {
  cat(
    '::: {.grid .align-items-center}\n\n',
    '::: {.g-col-1 .text-center}\n\n',
    '<i class="fa ', icon, ' fa-2x" aria-hidden="true" style="color: #00bc8c;"></i>\n\n',
    ':::\n\n',
    '::: {.g-col-8}\n\n',
    '### ', title, '\n\n',
    description, '\n\n',
    ':::\n\n',
    '::: {.g-col-3 .text-end}\n\n',
    '<style>\n',
    '  @media (min-width: 768px) {\n',
    '    .github-badge { height: 28px; }\n',
    '    .fa-2x { font-size: 2em; }\n',
    '  }\n',
    '  @media (max-width: 767px) {\n',
    '    .github-badge { height: 20px; }\n',
    '    .fa-2x { font-size: 1.5em; }\n',
    '  }\n',
    '</style>\n',
    '<a href="https://github.com/surveydown-dev/', repo_name, '">\n',
    '  <img class="github-badge" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/view_on-GitHub-00bc8c?style=for-the-badge&logo=GitHub" alt="View on GitHub">\n',
    '</a>\n\n',
    ':::\n\n',
    ':::\n\n',
    sep = ""
  )
}

build_demo_grid <- function(df) {
  for (i in 1:nrow(df)) {
    create_demo_card(
      title = df$title[i],
      description = df$description[i],
      repo_name = df$repo_name[i],
      icon = df$icon[i]
    )
    cat('\n')  # Add a newline between entries for better readability
  }
}
```
